title: Kalaiyil pookkum Lyrics Kadhale Nimmadhi
stanzas:
Kalaiyil pookkum
kalloori poove
enai maalaiyil mayakkum
manmadhan neethaane.

poovil sendru poottikolvom
muththachaetril maatti kolvom
kanavukku parisalippom

vaanam sendru neelam kolvom
kadhal kondu kaalam velvom
nizhalukku uyir tharuvom.

kadhalukkum karpu undu
sol sol
karpu mattum kadhal illai
sol sol

niyani thannai kadhal vellum
sol sol
kadhalukkum niyanam undu
sol sol

noottraandai noottrandai
nodiyinil kalandhavar yaaro
kaatre kaatre sol
kadhalil vendravar thaano

nermaiyilum thoomai undu
sol sol
kadhalukku aanmai undu
sol sol
aanmaikullum thaaimai undu
sol sol

kannaale kannaale
kadhalai vanagida thaane
vandhome vandhome
kadhalin pillaigal naamey

kavithaigal vazhi vida
kanavugal vidai pera
thidumena vidigirathe

Kalaiyil pookkum
kalloori poove
enai maalaiyil mayakkum
manmadhan neethaane.

poovil sendru poottikolvom
muththachaetril maatti kolvom
kanavukku parisalippom

vaanam sendru neelam kolvom
kadhal kondu kaalam velvom
nizhalukku uyir tharuvom.
